description.text: Comprehensive timing systems for tarot reading and life cycle analysis

quote.text: Time is not linear but cyclical, and the tarot cards reflect the eternal patterns that govern all temporal manifestation.

description.text: Ancient system dividing each day into 24 planetary hours for optimal timing

calculation_method.text: Divide sunrise to sunset into 12 equal parts (day hours), sunset to sunrise into 12 equal parts (night hours)
